solution_line_template: Maria has ${maria_saved} and received ${mother_gave} from her mother. So she has {maria_saved} + {mother_gave} = $<<{maria_saved}+{mother_gave}={maria_total}>>{maria_total}.
As the price of the bike stands at ${bike_price}, Maria needs {bike_price} – {maria_total} = $<<{bike_price}-{maria_total}={maria_needs}>>{maria_needs} more to buy the bike.
